name: Rough Seas
description:
Rough Seas is a small Indie 3rd person naval action game, where you control an 18th century sailing ship tasked with reaching your destination while being under attack of enemy pirates.

In the game you may expect 2 gamemodes: Campaign - which is the main gameplay and focus of the game. Arena - The optional fighting between you and endless hordes of pirates in an arena.

Controls: The standard WASD (W - forward, A Left, S Back, D Right.)
Left Mouse to shoot. And Right Mouse for moving the camera
